label: GoogleHotels
description: Arcade.dev LLM tools for getting Hotel information via Google Hotels

tools.name: SearchHotels
tools.description: Retrieve hotel search results using the Google Hotels API.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to search for hotels, e.g., a city name, a state, etc.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Anything that would be used in a regular Google Hotels search

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency code for prices. Defaults to 'USD'

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Minimum price per night. Defaults to no minimum

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Maximum price per night. Defaults to no maximum

parameters.name: num_adults
parameters.description: Number of adults per room. Defaults to 2

parameters.name: num_children
parameters.description: Number of children per room. Defaults to 0

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The sorting order of the results. Defaults to RELEVANCE

parameters.name: num_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 5. Max 20

output.description: Hotel search results from the Google Hotels API

documentationChunks.content:
The Arcade Google Hotels MCP Server uses the [SerpAPI](https://serpapi.com/) to search for hotels on Google Hotels.

- **Secret:**
  - `SERP_API_KEY`: Your SerpAPI API key.

<Callout type="info">
Setting the `SERP_API_KEY` secret is only required if you are [self-hosting](/guides/deployment-hosting/configure-engine) Arcade. If you're using Arcade Cloud, the secret is already set for you. To manage your secrets, go to the [Secrets page](https://api.arcade.dev/dashboard/auth/secrets) in the Arcade Dashboard.
</Callout>

summary:
Arcade.dev provides the GoogleHotels toolkit, enabling developers to efficiently retrieve hotel information through the Google Hotels API. This toolkit facilitates hotel searches, offering a streamlined method to access comprehensive hotel data.

**Capabilities:**  
- Effortlessly search for hotels based on various parameters.  
- Retrieve detailed hotel information including availability and pricing.  
- Integrate smoothly with existing applications for enhanced user experience.  

**OAuth:**  
- No OAuth authentication required.

**Secrets:**  
- API Key: Use the `SERP_API_KEY` for API access and secure interactions with the Google Hotels service.
